summary: A commitment-phobe agrees to marry his girlfriend, setting in motion a series of hilarious mishaps that has him questioning what he got himself into.
cast: Rahul Bose|Mallika Sherawat|Ranvir Shorey|Sharat Saxena|Shabnam Kapoor|Jas Arora|Suchitra Pillai|Taraana Raja|Aamir Bashir|Sophiya Chaudhary|Sapna Bhavnani
title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
